hero.description: With a passion for data and a love for smart, clean code. Quick to learn, positive in teams – always chasing clever solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: As a Full Stack Developer, I love working across the stack — because why pick just frontend or backend when you can have both? My sweet spot: data. Collecting it, shaping it, using it. Whether at work or in my side projects, I’m always tinkering with new ways to gather and wrangle information.
about.paragraph2: I dive into new topics fast and get genuinely excited about what I do (sometimes too excited — ask my teammates). That enthusiasm usually rubs off, and I try to keep things positive, focused, and fun around the dev table.
about.paragraph3: Before coding, I was a tutor, a photographer, and even a team lead at the Red Cross. All those roles taught me to see things from different angles — and yes, sometimes to debug people problems before code ones.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects. From developing innovative platform analysis solutions to advanced web scraping tools, these projects reflect my passion for modern web technologies and efficient software solutions. Each project presents its own technical challenges and learning opportunities.

fritz.title: Fritz – December 2024
fritz.description: My most meaningful launch to date: Project Fritz. Deployed December 2024, full of love, potential, and long-term support plans. Features include sleepless nights, heart-melting smiles, and a rapidly evolving API for joy.

marktzone.title: MarktZone.io
marktzone.description: A smart analysis tool for monitoring and comparing Amazon marketplaces. Built to uncover trends, track products, and reveal hidden insights across regional markets.

checkdiepreise.title: check-die-preise.de
checkdiepreise.description: Scrapes online shops and analyzes historical price data to track trends and spot deals. Your backend-powered detective for price evolution and e-commerce intel.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I look forward to hearing from you. Simply fill out the form, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.header: Contact Form - Ping me like a Pro
form.instructions: Please follow the steps below to send me a message:

steps.1: Enter your email and press Enter
steps.2: Type your message and press Enter

form.notice: NOTICE: The keyword "tokyo" is restricted to civilian access. Standard contact form users should ignore this warning and should not type "tokyo" in the email field and press enter.

email.label: Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

contact.success: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

cv.title: Education & Certifications
cv.description: My educational path reflects my passion for technology and continuous learning. Starting with a strong foundation in mathematics and physics, I transitioned into computer science and modern web technologies. Through formal education and professional certifications, I have built a diverse skillset that combines theoretical knowledge with practical expertise in cloud computing and web development.
cv.info: Click on any point in the timeline to learn more about each milestone.

bta.title: Bio. Technic. Assistant
bta.description: Vocational training as a certified Biological Technical Assistant at Lise-Meitner-Schule in Berlin. Acquired strong analytical skills and scientific foundations that have proven valuable for a systematic approach to complex technical problems.

bachelor.title: B.A, HU Berlin
bachelor.description: Bachelor of Arts (Geography) with a focus on analytical thinking and problem-solving. Combined theoretical knowledge with practical applications in scientific computing.

master.title: M.A, University of Illinois, USA
master.description: Master of Science with a specialization in data analysis and computational methods. Gained in-depth expertise in statistical analysis and data-driven decision-making. Worked as a statistics tutor.

teamleader.title: Team Lead
teamleader.description: DRK Flüchtlingshilfe Brandenburg gGmbH, Doberlug-Kirchhain, social support. Leadership role including building and managing a team of 10 staff members, creating duty and personnel development plans. Responsible for training, evaluation and monitoring, staff appraisals, cross-functional coordination, reporting, and budget accountability.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Software Developer
fullstack.description: Fullstack development of modern applications using .NET Core, Entity Framework, Python, and automated testing (Selenium/UIPath). Daily use of Git for version control and close collaboration in agile teams. Key projects include a modular business management app (Blazor, ASP.NET Core, PostgreSQL) and a lab middleware system (Spring Boot, Java, Docker).

instructor.title: IT Instructor
instructor.description: cimdata Bildungsakademie GmbH. Independently organized and taught 4-week modules with around 15 participants. Modules included: Python (Basics, Data Science in Python), Dart & Flutter, HTML5 & CSS3 (Basics and Advanced, including SASS). Delivered knowledge on programming languages and state-of-the-art technologies. Full-time course, Monday to Friday via Zoom.

az900.title: AZ 900
az900.description: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900), Microsoft certified. Cloud basics and benefits – scalability, availability, cost. Overview of Azure services – compute, storage, networking, databases. Security, compliance, and data protection in Azure. Understanding pricing, SLAs, and cloud lifecycle.

dp209.title: DP 203
dp209.description: Microsoft certified. Azure Data Engineer Associate (DP-203). Storing data in Azure – Lake, Blob, Synapse and more. Building pipelines with Data Factory & Spark for clean data flows. Optimizing and transforming models – using SQL, Python, Delta Lake. Ensuring security, monitoring, and scaling of stable data platforms.

pcap.title: PCAP
pcap.description: PCAP – Certified Associate Python Programmer, Python Institute. Mastering data types, variables, loops, and conditionals. Using functions, modules, and handling exceptions properly. Understanding OOP: classes, inheritance, methods, and constructors. Applying standard libraries – from strings to file access.

pcep.title: PCEP
pcep.description: PCEP – Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer, Python Institute. Learning fundamentals: syntax, data types, variables, input/output. Applying operators, conditionals, and loops confidently. Writing functions and spotting simple errors. Understanding lists, tuples, dictionaries, and core Python logic.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.content: This website is operated by Sebastian Christoph. For any inquiries, please use the contact form provided on this website.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. We do not collect any personal data without your explicit consent. For more information about how we handle your data, please contact us through the provided contact form.
